At Occams Advisory, we specialize in maximizing your business's tax credits, enabling substantial federal tax savings for activities that drive growth and innovation. Our expert team offers comprehensive guidance, ensuring you capture every eligible tax credit while adhering to all federal regulations.

We provide specialized services, including R&D Tax Credits, Employee Retention Credits (ERC), and Cost Segregation, to optimize your tax position and support your business objectives. For self-employed individuals, our Self-Employed Tax Credit (SETC) platform simplifies the process of claiming entitled credits, helping you enhance your financial efficiency.

Partner with Occams Advisory to ensure your business benefits from all available tax incentives, driving your growth and securing your financial future.

The Employee Retention Credit (ERC) is a tax credit designed to encourage businesses to keep employees on their payroll during the pandemic. It provides financial relief to businesses by covering the wages paid to employees.

The R&D Tax Credit incentivises innovation by allowing businesses to reduce tax liability for research expenditures. It promotes technological advancements, economic growth, & competitiveness, benefiting companies & enabling R&D.

The Self-Employed Tax Credit (SETC) platform offers vital tax relief for self-employed individuals impacted by the pandemic. It helps manage tax liabilities, encourages entrepreneurship, & supports small businesses by making it easier to reinvest in growth & operations.
